scripts.build:functions: npm run build:database  && npm i --workspace=packages/functions && npm run build --workspace=packages/functions
scripts.build:sdk: npm run build:interfaces && npm i --workspace=packages/sdk && npm run build --workspace=packages/sdk
scripts.build:database: npm run build:interfaces && npm i --workspace=packages/database && npm run build --workspace=packages/database
scripts.build:search: npm run build:database && npm i --workspace=packages/search && npm run build --workspace=packages/search
scripts.clean: npm run clean:functions; npm run clean:interfaces; npm run clean:indexes; npm run clean:sdk; npm run clean:search; npm run clean:database; rm -rf node_modules
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean; npm run build
